p: Predicted change varies among the GCMs, as portrayed for two species, the Lesser Yellowlegs and Baird's Sandpiper, and two GCMs, the relatively warm/wet IPSL‐CM5B‐LR and hot/dry ACCESS1‐0 (Figure 5). Overall, probabilities of occurrence for the Lesser Yellowlegs and Baird's Sandpiper increased by 0.013 and 0.029, respectively (Table 6), yet there were areas with predicted declines as large as −0.37 and increases of 0.49 (Figure 5b).
